title: WEAR - Fashion Lookbook
description:
WEAR is sure to inspire you with more than 9 million outfit posts. Follow fashion enthusiasts and show us your own style. Search our stylish community for endless outfit inspiration that you can shop.
Just some of the things you can do with WEAR:
• Fashion Inspiration
-Millions of outfit ideas at your fingertips.
-Search for styles, brands and trends you love.
-Post your looks and join a global style-minded community.
-Save looks and items you'd like to see again, and organize them into folders.
-Follow top global fashion influencers for outfit inspo.
• Shop
-Shop your favorite street style looks in one place.
-Find the exact item from an outfit you love.
-Shop top trends from countless stores with a few simple clicks.
• Social Networks
-Log into WEAR with your Twitter or Facebook account.
-Connect your WEAR account to your Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter accounts.
-Share your looks easily across social networks.
Follow us:
• Instagram
https://www.instagram.com/wear_worldwide/
• Twitter
https://twitter.com/wear_worldwide
• facebook
https://www.facebook.com/Wearofficial/
• Pinterest
https://www.pinterest.jp/wear_worldwide/
• weibo
http://www.weibo.com/wearchina
*The app is free
